dict.acceptation: （表示时间）从…；（表示原因）因为；（表示来源）来自…；（表示分离）与…分离[隔开]；

sent.orig: Yama is abstention from harming others, from false-hood, from theft, from incontinence, and from greed.
sent.trans: 不杀生、不说谎、不偷盗、不纵欲、不贪婪。

sent.orig: Representing Creoleness. Perspectives from history, from orthography, from literature and from sociology.
sent.trans: 表现克理奥尔特质。从历史、拼字法、文学和社会学的观点。

sent.orig: Perspectives from history, from orthography, from literature and from sociology.
sent.trans: 从历史、拼字法、文学和社会学的观点。
